channel.title: 317 & 508... some clarification please?
channel.description:
I have been off the scene on mopar for at least a year, and was programming back in the days of testscape and Pimpscape etc.
can someone please get me up to date on the differences between 508/317 etc and which is more suited to what?
Tim

item.title: 317 & 508... some clarification please?
item.dc:creator: @shayd3e shayd3e
item.description:
@shayd3e wrote:

RS2HD is probably the most stable 508 server
And dudes it doesnt matter what revision it is
They both are stable but its just how its coded

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @mod_jesus mod jesus
item.description:
@mod_jesus wrote:

the diff is 508 better than 317!

Read full topic

item.title: 317 & 508... some clarification please?
item.dc:creator: @Java_Is_My_Bitch2 Java Is My Bitch
item.description:
@Java_Is_My_Bitch2 wrote:

[quote=“xxlukexx, post:8, topic:319331”][quote author=Owned_Pl0xs link=topic=415801.msg3059071#msg3059071 date=1260727538]

508 are really unstable, (so is delta) but everyone uses.

go with what ever, if you want to learn more, program 508s, if you want be able to be really good and do what most people do, go with 317s, 377

508s are not unstable.

There are specific sources, such as RS2HD, which was constructed by Graham, and it is very stable.

Such as for Palidino’s base, it’s not that stable.

RS2HD is more for experienced programmers although, so no mere ‘mortal’ thinks they will just download RS2HD and use it in the simplest of ways.
[/quote]

508-525 are very unstable…

go on a server that is 508 or 525 and tell me how many times it dcs in 5min. seriously, they are really unstable.[/quote]LOL! You my friend are stuck in the past. 508s are way more stable than most 317 servers simply because they’re not stuffed with useless shit.

Read full topic

item.title: 317 & 508... some clarification please?
item.dc:creator: @shayd3e shayd3e
item.description:
@shayd3e wrote:

Ok everyone the truth is
For a server to be stable it matters how its coded
And the guy who said RS2HD is the most stable 508 server
Your right because he uses conventions and he coded the whole thing properly
and the new palidino servers are using stuff from RS2HD because Graham released a
WORKING EventManager which is really useful

Read full topic

item.title: 317 & 508... some clarification please?
item.dc:creator: @Owned_Pl0xs Owned_Pl0xs
item.description:
@Owned_Pl0xs wrote:

[quote=“xxlukexx, post:15, topic:319331”][quote author=Owned_Pl0xs link=topic=415801.msg3059090#msg3059090 date=1260728327]

no 508s are very stable like 317s dude.

317s are not stable at all.

You should know that most 317s are based off of wL (winterLove) which was a very unstable base. The base was made simply to prove you could emulate runescape, and then people went and started using it.

As for Dodian, that is a different story. Servers like Deltascape and Devolution are based off Dodian, and dodian is stable in a sense, but RS2HD is alot more stabler then any base for 317s.

no lol.
go ask people how stable 508s are.
317s are way more stable than them.

few hundred people on a 508 and it will dc/crash every few min.

You’re retarded.
Are you ignoring what I am saying and sticking to “317s are most stable then 508s?”

If you were to compare any 317 base to RS2HD, it would miserably fail.

Stupid ignorant cunt.
[/quote]

NO IT WOULDN’T. LMFAO.

ALL 508S AND 525S ARE UNSTABLE. obviously, you have never ever ever played a 500+ server.[/quote]

I’ve hosted one.
It was Palidino’s base. It was pretty horrible, to be honest.

But if I used RS2HD and not Palidino’s base it would be alot better.
Servers like JC-Scape and others have had 300 on at one time with no lag or dcs thanks to RS2HD.

The fact that you think 508s+ are unstable is because many people use Palidino’s base.
If everyone used RS2HD, you would not be saying anything, because RS2HD is stable as fuck. People just don’t use it for their 508s or 525s. If they did, then no 317 servers “stability” could compare to them.

Read full topic

go with what ever, if you want to learn more, program 508s, if you want be able to be really good and do what most people do, go with 317s, 377

There are specific sources, such as RS2HD, which was constructed by Graham, and it is very stable.

Let me repeat, RS2HD, a server released by Graham, is very stable. There is RS2HD for both 508s and 525s. More people use Palidinos base although, and his base is not as stable.

Before replying to another one of my posts, take a look at RS2HD:

http://rapidshare.com/files/201104470/RS2HD_v101.rar

item.title: 317 & 508... some clarification please?
item.dc:creator: @Owned_Pl0xs Owned_Pl0xs
item.description:
@Owned_Pl0xs wrote:

508 is the more newer version of RS (Updated graphics, npcs, emotes, interfaces etc…)

317 is what it’s always been, the old version of rs. Except now people have found out how to dump emotes and gfxs and even maps from the newer versions of RS and make them formatible to 317s. I don’t see the point in this because you can just use 508s and don’t have to go through all the trouble of adding all the stuff into the 317 client.

508 servers are packaged, 317s are not. For some reason, all these noobs don’t use 508s because of the packaging.

Basically, just use 508s if you like newer versions of rs, and use 317 if you like the old look, but if you want to add new emotes etc… you will have to go through the hassle of that.

Read full topic
